body: I know it's NTR just by looking at the cover

I know that if this genre exist is because people consums it... but WHY!?!? (i ask like the Ryan Reynolds meme) ¿¿¿WHY??? ¿why?

Even it's a little hipocritical of me, i consums it a little, but always make me feel like shit after, sometimes (if the comic is really fabricated to hurt) for 1 or 2 days.
the most generic netorare that i ever seen, i dont even need english translation to understand the plot lol, at least the art is good.
yeah if i could tell where this was going based on the coverpage alone, then i've spent too much time lost in the NTR nation.
